name: The Block Pro
title: Q4 2024 Blockchain Ma Surge
text:
Synopsis
The blockchain sector experienced significant M&A activity and consolidation in Q4 2024, driven by Bitcoin's price surge, favorable regulatory environment, and increased venture funding under the Trump administration.

Key Insights
- Bitcoin approached the $100,000 milestone in 2024
- Blockchain venture funding showed resilience and recalibration during the year
- Trump administration created a favorable regulatory environment for digital assets
- NFT trading volumes surged by 267.1% in December 2024, primarily due to Pudgy Penguin token airdrop
- A TRUMP memecoin was launched on January 17, 2025, and endorsed by President-elect Donald Trump
- The blockchain sector demonstrated increased mergers and acquisitions activity, signaling industry consolidation
